#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
inline void inp( int &n )
{
n=0;
int ch=getcx();int sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getcx();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
n=n*sign;
}
int main()
{
    int t,total,m,w,c,temp;
    inp(t);
    //scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    inp(total);
    inp(m);
    inp(w);
    inp(c);
   // scanf("%d %d %d %d",&total,&m,&w,&c);
    temp=m*2;
    if(temp>=w)
    w=w;
    else
    w=temp;
    temp=(m+w)*4;
    if(temp>=c)
    c=c;
    else
    c=temp;
    temp=total*4/5;
    if(temp>=c)
    c=c;
    else
    c=temp;
    temp=(total-c)*2/3;
    if(temp>=w)
    w=w;
    else
    w=temp;
    temp=total-c-w; 
    if(temp>=m)
    m=m;
    else
    m=temp;
    printf("%d %d %d \n",m,w,c);
    }
    return 0;
}
